movie.title: Aliens
movie.plot: When Ripley's lifepod is found by a salvage crew over 50 years later, she finds that terra-formers are on the very planet they found the alien species. When the company sends a family of colonists out to investigate her storyâ€”all contact is lost with the planet and colonists. They enlist Ripley and the colonial marines to return and search for answers.

events.title: Burke sends a group of colonists to check out a crashed alien spaceship
